We DAGO incorporates urban transportation for customers and driver-partners onto a mobile technology platform ensuring convenient, transparent, and quick service fulfilment. Our network includes around 100 experienced drivers, native from Sri Lanka.

 DAGO assures a service delivered by highly skilled professional drivers in an iconic vehicle that is trusted by passengers to ferry them quickly and safely from place to place.
 We still believe that taxis services can be so much more than just a means to an end – our clients are right to expect extraordinary standards, and by allying the latest technologies with traditional customer service values, we can not only disrupt the industry, we can revolutionize it.
 DAGO will continue to deliver a high-quality service that is 100% accessible, fast, safe and secure.

At the time of registration, the user agrees to provide accurate and correct information, complete and updated. DAGO will be obliged to supervise or control the accuracy of the information.


Collection of Information you provide to Us.
 We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create or modify your account, request on demand services, contact customer support or otherwise communicate with us.

 This information may include:

 • Name
 • Email
 • Phone Number
 • Postal address
 • Profile picture
 • Payment method
 • Items requested (for delivery services)
 • Delivery notes and other information you choose to provide. 



Information We Collect Through Your Use of Our Service:
 When you use our Service, we collect information about you in the following general categories:
 
 • Location Information: When you use the Service for transportation or delivery, we collect precise location data about the trip from the DAGO app used by the driver. If you permit the DAGO app to access location service through the permission system used by your mobile operating system, we may also collect the precise location of your device when the app is running in the foreground or background. We may also derive your approximate location from your IP address. 

 • Contact Information: If you permit the DAGO app to access the address book on your device through the permission system used by your mobile platform, we may access and store names and contact information from your address book to facilitate social interactions through our Service and for other purposes described in this statement or at the time of consent or collection.
